com.encoway.edu

Class EventDrivenUpdatesListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.encoway.edu.EventDrivenUpdatesListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, ComponentSystemEventListener, FacesListener, SystemEventListener

    public class EventDrivenUpdatesListener
extends Object
implements SystemEventListener, ComponentSystemEventListener

    SystemEventListener mapping event names to registered UIComponent’s IDs.
